required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Sample Collection Study to Validate the NEPHROCLEAR™ CCL14 Test
clinical_study.official_title: A Sample Collection Study to Validate the NEPHROCLEAR™ CCL14 Test

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this sample collection study is to collect urine samples to validate the NEPHROCLEAR™ CCL14 Test in patients with KDIGO stage 2 or 3 AKI. This study is observational and will have no impact on the medical management of the subject.

primary_outcome.measure: Persistent Severe Acute Kidney Injury as Determined by Physician Adjudication

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients with KDIGO stage 2 or 3 AKI

intervention.intervention_name: Urine collection for NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test
intervention.description: Urine will be collected and banked for future analysis with the NEPHROCLEAR CCL14 Test
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients with KDIGO stage 2 or 3 AKI

study_pop.textblock: Adult ICU patients with KDIGO stage 2 or 3 AKI.
